title: Happy Birthday, Nico-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Nico-san, happy birthday!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Thanks♪ You came to greet me huh~, on Nico, the greatest treasure of the whole universe’s birthday…. You can celebrate it too, if you want<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh…. Ruby can celebrate it too….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You don’t have to be so tense~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Nico-san!! Ruby, Ruby…. really respects you, Nico-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufun, Nico is the number one school idol in the universe after all, so that’s only to be expected<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Even though Nico-san isn’t that much taller than Ruby, it doesn’t feel like that at all on stage! Ruby talked about this with Ayumu-san before, but when Nico-san is on stage, it feels like Ruby can’t take Ruby’s eyes off of Nico-san, and it feels like Ruby’s favorite songs are over in an instant….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, that’s right~, Both Ruby and Ayumu understand huh~. Nico is perfect♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>For Ruby to celebrate your birthday, Nico-san, it’s like a dream come true….! Umm, so, from now on Ruby is going to take you to all of the places that Ruby loves, okay! Like the shop with really delicious sweets, or the shop with cute accessories…. Can we even visit them all in one day? Nico-san, can you…. stay over?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez~, if you want it that much then I guess it can’t be helped~~♪♪♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
